long_description: With a touch of BMX style, the Marin MBX 50 16 in. kids' bike is great for young riders honing their skills, and features a durable frame and adjustable training wheels. Tough aluminum frame is built with the same shaped tubing used on Marin adult bikes, helping it withstand the rigors of frequent use. Single-speed operation keeps the riding simple and training wheels help a young rider build confidence. Rear coaster brake is intuitively easy to engage with a simple backpedal; additional linear-pull rear brake introduces the rider to hand brakes. Features a BMX-style handlebar. Chainguard helps keep pant legs from getting snagged or soiled by the chain. Adjustable training wheels speed the learning process. Kids' cushy saddle makes for all-day fun. Specs for the Marin MBX 50 16 in. kids' bike are subject to change.
